name: MegaFlail
description:
MegaFlail is a action-building game. Build your ultimate weapon, and join it to yourself. Then, see how many waves of the undead you can survive by swinging around.

The game is a submission to the 2021 Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam, with the theme "Joined Together."

Controls:

  • Click buttons or use displayed hotkeys to edit your weapon
  • Use WASD or arrow keys to move around in combat
